About: Ted Knight and Jim J! in one show!!!!

I build stuff, and my interests relate to fun and useful applications and innovations on hardware/software hybrids, web apps, and analytical solutions.

Programming: PHP, C, Java, C#, Lisp, Matlab Web: PHP/MySQL/CSS/AJAX (JQuery) Javascript Electronics: general and digital electronics, (AVRs atmega8, atmega168), prototyping, RF modules Analytics: linear/numerical/non-linear analysis, quantum information, machine learning techniques (bayes classifiers, neural networks), optimization (simulated annealing, simplex algorithm, Kohonnens neural net)

As of entrepreneurship and startups I think I agree with Steve Wozniak who once said that "having a firm seems fun thing and that is a good reason to have it".

Related to sports, I do squash and body building. I'm also very passionate about films and film making.
